mapper.sql: room_type_id, chain_id, hotel_id, hotel_name,room_type_code, room_type_name, description, standard_price, max_occupancy, physical_inventory, created_at,updated_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_types ( room_type_id, chain_id, hotel_id, room_type_name, room_type_code, description, standard_price, max_occupancy, physical_inventory, created_at,updated_at ) VALUES ( #{roomTypeId}, #{chainId}, #{hotelId}, #{roomTypeName}, #{roomTypeCode}, #{description}, #{standardPrice}, #{maxOccupancy}, #{physicalInventory}, NOW(),NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT rt.room_type_id, rt.chain_id, rt.hotel_id, h.hotel_name, rt.room_type_name, rt.room_type_code, rt.description, rt.standard_price, rt.max_occupancy, rt.physical_inventory, rt.created_at FROM room_types rt LEFT JOIN hotels h ON rt.hotel_id = h.hotel_id WHERE rt.room_type_id = #{roomTypeId}

SELECT rt.room_type_id, rt.chain_id, rt.hotel_id, h.hotel_name, rt.room_type_name, rt.room_type_code, rt.description, rt.standard_price, rt.max_occupancy, rt.physical_inventory, rt.created_at FROM room_types rt LEFT JOIN hotels h ON rt.hotel_id = h.hotel_id WHERE rt.room_type_code = #{roomTypeCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE room_types SET room_type_name = #{roomTypeName}, description = #{description}, max_occupancy = #{maxOccupancy}, physical_inventory = #{physicalInventory}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE room_type_id = #{roomTypeId}
mapper.select: SELECT rt.room_type_id, rt.chain_id, rt.hotel_id, rt.room_type_name, rt.room_type_code, rt.description, rt.standard_price, rt.max_occupancy, rt.physical_inventory, rt.created_at, rt.updated_at FROM room_types rt WHERE rt.hotel_id = #{hotelId} ORDER BY rt.room_type_code ASC

SELECT rt.room_type_id, rt.chain_id, rt.hotel_id, rt.room_type_name, rt.room_type_code, rt.description, rt.standard_price, rt.max_occupancy, rt.physical_inventory, rt.created_at, rt.updated_at FROM room_types rt WHERE rt.hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND rt.room_type_code = #{roomTypeCode}

SELECT rt.room_type_id, rt.chain_id, rt.hotel_id, rt.room_type_name, rt.room_type_code, rt.description, rt.standard_price, rt.max_occupancy, rt.physical_inventory, rt.created_at, rt.updated_at FROM room_types rt WHERE rt.hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND rt.room_type_code = #{roomTypeCode}
